text:
I had a 2.0.35, I've installed 2.0.40 over it.
PHP was loaded as a module (php4apache2.dll).
The dll is in the module dir, as it is said in httpd.conf.
Apache doesn't start .
In the event log of windows I have : 
The Apache service named  reported the following error:
>>> Cannot load C:/Program Files/apache/Apache2/modules/php4apache2.dll into
server: procedure not found

In the error.log of Apache :
[Tue Aug 27 16:17:29 2002] [notice] Parent: Received shutdown signal -- Shutting
down the server.
[Tue Aug 27 16:17:29 2002] [notice] Child 2332: Exit event signaled. Child
process is ending.
[Tue Aug 27 16:17:30 2002] [notice] Child 2332: Released the start mutex
[Tue Aug 27 16:17:31 2002] [notice] Child 2332: Waiting for 250 worker threads
to exit.
[Tue Aug 27 16:17:31 2002] [notice] Child 2332: All worker threads have exited.
[Tue Aug 27 16:17:31 2002] [notice] Child 2332: Child process is exiting
[Tue Aug 27 16:17:31 2002] [notice] Parent: Child process exited successfully.

Is 2.0.40 able to work with PHP as module ?

Thanks

DEN
creator: rouxdenis@wanadoo.fr
slive@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 11778 ***
